channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tensions rise at college protests as Johnson calls for Columbia president to resign
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protests are taking place at major US universities, prompting some officials to take extraordinary steps to confront the growing crisis. Follow for live news updates.

item.title: Australia and New Zealand honor their war dead with dawn services on Anzac Day
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of people have gathered across Australia and New Zealand for dawn services and street marches to commemorate their war dead on Anzac Day

item.title: Witness testimony to continue in Trump's hush money trial
item.description: Witness testimony will continue Thursday in Donald Trump's hush money criminal trial. Follow here for the latest live news updates from court, analysis and more.

item.title: Giuliani, Meadows indicted in Arizona fake elector scheme
item.description: Several former and current key aides to former President Donald Trump appear to be among those charged by the Arizona State Attorney General.

item.title: April 24, 2024 - US university protests
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protests are taking place at major American universities, prompting some officials to take extraordinary steps to confront the growing crisis. Follow for live news updates.

item.title: College encampments grow nationwide: What students are saying
item.description: Protests calling for the divestment from Israeli military operations have continued to spread on college campuses throughout the country.

item.title: April 24, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Hamas released a video of Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin, the first proof that he survived being badly wounded during his capture on October 7. He is shown in the undated video with part of his left arm missing.

item.title: Comparing Donald Trump's hush money trial to John Edwards, Bill Clinton cases
item.description: Donald Trump's hush money trial is underway, and it's drawing attention to past high-profile litigation involving political stars and salacious affair allegations.

item.title: Supreme Court hears case about emergency abortion care
item.description: The Supreme Court heard oral arguments in another major abortion access case as it grapples with the aftermath of reversing Roe v. Wade. Follow here for live audio of the arguments, news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: Expanded so-called 'Don't Say Gay' education restrictions advance in Alabama
item.description: Alabama is on track to further restrict discussions of "gender identity or sexual orientation" in public schools in a new proposal of the so-called "Don't So Gay" law.
